S & W Electric Company is a family-owned and operated organization that designs and constructs industrial, commercial and institutional projects. The company provides panelboards, switches, drives and soft start motor controllers. It uses products from several companies, including Rockwell Automation, Westinghouse Electric Corporation and General Electric Company. In operation for more than 30 years, S & W Electric Company also offers circuit breaker enclosures and starters. The company provides services for River City Industrial Refrigeration, Tyson Foods, Bruno's Supermarkets and Boral Bricks. It has undertaken projects for Midfield Elementary School, Thomas Foundry and Doane Pet Care Products. S & W Electric Company is a member of Independent Electrical Contractors, the International Association of Electrical Inspectors and the National Fire Protection Association.

Alabama Power, a part of Southern Company, supplies electricity to more than 1 million homes, businesses and industries in southern Alabama. It owns and operates more than 80 electric generating units. The company also maintains an economic development department. Founded in 1906, Alabama Power s hydroelectric generating plants have created several lakes on the Tallapoosa, Coosa and Warrior rivers. It maintains a staff of over 6,700 individuals. In addition, the company serves architects, engineers, builders, developers and property managers. Alabama Power administers land management programs to preserve the natural heritage. It generates electricity from coal, hydro, natural gas, oil and nuclear sources. The company additionally supports community organizations.

Southern Company is a regional energy company with more than 40,000 megawatts of electric-generating capacity in the Southeastern United States. It is one of the largest producers of electricity in the United States. The company supplies energy to a 120,000-square-mile service territory throughout most of Georgia and Alabama, southeastern Mississippi and the panhandle region of Florida. It is ranked in the top 200 in the Fortune 500 listing of the largest United States corporations. Southern Company owns five regulated retail electric utilities: Alabama Power, Georgia Power, Gulf Power, Mississippi Power and Savannah Electric. It also owns Southern Nuclear and Southern Company Gas. The company trades on the New York Stock Exchange under the symbol SO. It is headquartered in Atlanta.

Residential Services Our experienced certified professional electricians will make electrical installations, electrical retrofits, & simple electrical repairs for your home in a timely manner. As mentioned before LED has become very popular.  We specialize in LED retrofitting, that way you can changeover to more economical lighting and save money.  We install dimmers, simple sockets, and will even come out to replace a light bulb for you. Many times our customers request we come to install a ceiling fan, flat panel TV installation, or hang a chandelier for them.  Another customer upgrade favorite is sprucing up outdoor lighting. It is ranked in the top 200 in the Fortune 500 listing of the largest United States corporations. Residential Services Our experienced certified professional electricians will make electrical installations, electrical retrofits, & simple electrical repairs for your home in a timely manner.  We schedule the job out according to your plans, and provide service within reasonable time constraints.   We specialize in various types of new construction.  We can plan and complete new house wiring.  We also can help you design proper lighting in the house and perform the lighting installation.  LED lighting has been on the rise.  We can help with cost analysis and LED installations.  Two major items installed outside the home are generators and air conditioners. We will safely perform a generator installation so that your home never goes without power.  A new a/c installation can involve multiple outdoor units or one larger unit.  We will safely tap into your circuit breaker insuring a smooth installation.  There are a number of other residential services we provide.  Many times we can start with a Electrical Safety Inspection.  Whole house rewiring has been a recent trend for older houses.  This is usually coupled with Breaker Box Upgrades or Circuit Upgrades.  As mentioned before LED has become very popular.  We specialize in LED retrofitting, that way you can changeover to more economical lighting and save money.  We install dimmers, simple sockets, and will even come out to replace a light bulb for you. Southern Company is a regional energy company with more than 40,000 megawatts of electric-generating capacity in the Southeastern United States. It is one of the largest producers of electricity in the United States. It is ranked in the top 200 in the Fortune 500 listing of the largest United States corporations. Southern Company owns five regulated retail electric utilities: Alabama Power, Georgia Power, Gulf Power, Mississippi Power and Savannah Electric. It also owns Southern Nuclear and Southern Company Gas. The company trades on the New York Stock Exchange under the symbol SO. It is headquartered in Atlanta.

Best Birmingham Electrician sources you the best electricians in Birmingham Alabama.  We aim to bring you the most professional certified electricians in the area saving you money. Residential Services Our experienced certified professional electricians will make electrical installations, electrical retrofits, & simple electrical repairs for your home in a timely manner.  We schedule the job out according to your plans, and provide service within reasonable time constraints.   We specialize in various types of new construction.  We can plan and complete new house wiring.  We also can help you design proper lighting in the house and perform the lighting installation.  LED lighting has been on the rise. We will safely tap into your circuit breaker insuring a smooth installation.  There are a number of other residential services we provide.  Many times we can start with a Electrical Safety Inspection.  Whole house rewiring has been a recent trend for older houses.  This is usually coupled with Breaker Box Upgrades or Circuit Upgrades.  As mentioned before LED has become very popular.  We specialize in LED retrofitting, that way you can changeover to more economical lighting and save money.  We install dimmers, simple sockets, and will even come out to replace a light bulb for you. Many times our customers request we come to install a ceiling fan, flat panel TV installation, or hang a chandelier for them.  Another customer upgrade favorite is sprucing up outdoor lighting. Southern Nuclear Operating Company is a subsidiary of Southern Company. It is a licensed operator of three nuclear power plants: the Joseph M. Farley Nuclear Plant, the Edwin I. Hatch Nuclear Plant and the Alvin W. Vogtle Electric Generating Plant. These plants provide more than 20 percent of the electricity used in Alabama and Georgia. Southern Company is a regional energy company with more than 40,000 megawatts of electric generating capacity in the Southeastern United States. It is one of the largest producers of electricity in the United States. The company supplies energy to a 120,000-square-mile service territory throughout most of Georgia and Alabama, southeastern Mississippi and the panhandle region of Florida. It is ranked in the top 200 in the FORTUNE 500 listing of the largest United States corporations. Southern Company owns five regulated retail electric utilities: Alabama Power, Georgia Power, Gulf Power, Mississippi Power and Savannah Electric. Southern Nuclear Operating Company maintains operations in Birmingham, Ala.
